name: GoTeams
description: GoTeams builds and operates dedicated technology teams for third-party businesses. A subsidiary of GoGroup that leverages entrepreneurial experience and full-time employment models to deliver world-class tech solutions across all relevant tech disciplines and seniorities.
slogan: Dedicated Tech Teams for Digital Excellence
keywords: dedicated tech teams, software development, web development, mobile development, startup tech teams, corporate technology solutions

itemListElement.name: Find new business
itemListElement.description: Partner with client to scout, filter, and validate new business opportunities. Fast, focused, and backed by real market feedback.

itemListElement.name: Establish new business
itemListElement.description: Help partner the right structures, processes, and teams to successfully launch and scale new business initiatives.

itemListElement.name: Scale New Business
itemListElement.description: Help partner in scaling your business by optimizing processes, enhancing team capabilities, and leveraging technology.

itemListElement.name: AI Disruption
itemListElement.description: Leverage AI to transform partner's business operations, enhance customer experiences, and drive innovation.

itemListElement.name: AI Efficiency
itemListElement.description: Enhance operational efficiency and reduce costs through AI-driven automation and optimization.

itemListElement.name: Research and Development and Innovation
itemListElement.description: Dedicated technology teams for research and development

itemListElement.name: Business Units
itemListElement.description: Dedicated technology teams for business units

itemListElement.name: PE Owners and Investors
itemListElement.description: Technology teams for private equity backed companies

additionalProperty.name: Approach
additionalProperty.value: Entrepreneurial ownership mindset beyond traditional agency models

additionalProperty.name: Team Integration
